name: @feature-orchestrator/plugin
description: Stack-agnostic feature development orchestrator with multi-agent workflow, spec-driven development, and automated E2E verification via Playwright
author: Feature Orchestrator Team

commands.name: feature-orchestrator
commands.description: Launch the feature development orchestrator workflow

agents.name: feature-orchestrator
agents.description: Main orchestrator agent coordinating the entire feature development workflow

agents.name: spec-writer
agents.description: Converts feature requests into structured specifications and acceptance criteria

agents.name: docs-auditor
agents.description: Audits documentation and builds comprehensive acceptance checklists

agents.name: planner
agents.description: Detects tech stack and creates implementation plans

agents.name: backend-dev
agents.description: Implements backend changes following existing patterns

agents.name: frontend-dev
agents.description: Implements frontend changes following existing patterns

agents.name: playwright-tester
agents.description: Runs E2E tests via Playwright and correlates results with acceptance criteria

skills.name: playwright-runner
skills.description: High-level interface for running Playwright E2E tests with feature tagging

skills.name: docs-reader
skills.description: Reads and searches project documentation and specifications
